description: '''Chimurenga music''' is a [[Zimbabwe]]an popular music genre coined and popularized by [[Thomas Mapfumo]]. ''[[Chimurenga]]'' is a [[Shona language|Shona-language]] word for liberation, which entered common use during the [[Rhodesian Bush War]]. Mapfumo developed a style of music based on traditional Shona [[mbira]] music but played using modern electric instrumentation, with lyrics characterized by social and political commentary.
